alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 6:38PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Indian River, southern Brevard and east central Osceola Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 638 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Kenansville to Fellsmere. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Sebastian, Vero Beach and Fellsmere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Inland Indian River; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
